summary: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.
cast: Lise Danvers|Fabrice Luchini|Charlotte Alexandra|Lisbeth Hummel|Paloma Picasso|Pascale Christophe|Florence Bellamy|Lorenzo Berinizi|Jacopo Berinizi|Philippe Desboeuf|Tomas Hnevsa|Mathieu Rivolier|Robert Capia|Gerard Tcherka|Kjell Gustavsson|Nicole Karen|Marie Fors√•|Florence Dauman
title: Cuentos inmorales
